info.description: This is a comprehensive CRM system for course management with authentication and role-based access control.
info.title: GO CRM API

get.description: Get all announcements
Get an announcement by ID

post.description: Admin can create a new course category

409.description: Category with this name already exists

put.description: Update an existing category by ID

400.description: Invalid category ID or bad request body

409.description: Category with this name already exists

delete.description: Delete an existing category by ID

post.description: Admin creates a relationship between a course and a category

delete.description: Remove a course-category relationship by its ID

post.description: Admin creates a relationship between a course and a product. Prevents duplicates.

404.description: Course ID does not exist" or "Product ID does not exist

409.description: Product already exists for this course

500.description: Failed to create course product relationship

delete.description: Remove a relationship between a course and a product by its ID

post.description: Admin creates a new course. Prevents duplicate titles.

409.description: Course with the same title already exists

put.description: Admin updates course details by ID

400.description: Invalid course ID or request body

delete.description: Admin deletes a course by ID

post.description: Restores a deleted course material from archive

get.description: Fetches all data from the database and exports it as an Excel (.xlsx) file.

200.description: Excel file containing all exported data

post.description: Create a new lesson under a chapter
Admin creates a new product. Prevents duplicates by name.

409.description: Product with this name already exists

put.description: Update product details by its ID

400.description: Invalid product ID or request body

delete.description: Delete a product by its ID

get.description: Get all assignments
Get a single assignment by ID
get.summary: Get a single assignment by ID

post.description: Initiates a password reset process by sending a reset link to the provided email (if exists)

200.description: Success response with reset link (for testing)

get.description: Processes Google OAuth2 callback, creates/updates user, and returns JWT token
Redirects to Google OAuth2 consent screen with optional role parameter

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token with session information
Invalidates the user's session and clears authentication cookies
Confirms password reset using a valid token and sets new password

400.description: Invalid token, token expired, or invalid input

post.description: Create a new user account with first name, last name, email, password, and role

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available categories
Retrieve all courses that belong to a specific category
Get all chapters
Get a single chapter by ID
get.summary: Get a single chapter by ID

get.description: Get all course materials, optionally filtered by course, chapter, or lesson
Get course material with chapter and lesson details
Retrieve all courses available in the system
Retrieve details of a specific course using its ID
Retrieve a course along with products linked to it via the pivot table
get.summary: Get Products related to a course ID

get.description: Get all enrollments

post.description: Create a new enrollment with the provided details

get.description: Get an enrollment by its ID
Get all lessons, optionally filtered by course or chapter
Get lesson with chapter and course details
Retrieve a list of all products
Retrieve a single product by its ID
Retrieve all courses associated with a specific product via the pivot table
get.summary: Get related courses with product ID

message.example: The platform will be unavailable from 2AM to 4AM.

warning.example: No active session found for this token

models.LoginResponse.description: Login response with token and session information

price.description: Use float64 or better: create a Price type

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
